title: Launch Liquidity Mining on QuickSwap and prolong on 1inch (BSC) with new conditions
body:
We propose to launch a new Liquidity Mining program at `QuickSwap` on MATIC Network Mainnet and support it with 5’000 `$OPIUM` rewards for the first experimental week. Simultaneously, we propose decreasing rewards for the Liquidity Mining program on the BSC version on 1inch to 5’000 `$OPIUM` for the next week. We propose that the participants will be rewarded from the Ecosystem Fund at the end of the month via the `DR.OPIUM` mechanism.

Read the full proposal and discussion on the governance forum: 
https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-launch-liquidity-mining-on-quickswap-and-prolong-on-1inch-bsc-with-new-conditions/186
author: 0x55E170F82F50298188eecCe988e17046Dbef56A0
